insert into voice (object_id, `name`, content_type, `size`, data_id, image_url, created_date, created_by, update_date, update_by, sort, remark ) values (#{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update voice set object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `size` = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, object_id, `name`, content_type, `size`, data_id, image_url, created_date, created_by, update_date, update_by, sort, remark from voice where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
